main: ^Ugh this darn red light. Oh hey! Aren't you running for mayor? I do love fashion, as you can see, so I must ask what are your thoughts on my outfit?
^Horrible. Absoloutely hideous. I think I want to vomit

c-0: ^I know! You clearly know your fashion. You have my vote!
c-1: ^Yellow sweatpants?!? These are a one-of-a-kind pair of yellow slacks! You're not getting my vote!
c-2: ^HOW DARE YOU INSULT MY FASHION SENSE! PEOPLE LIKE YOU DON'T NEED TO BE IN THE OFFICE. NOW IF YOU'LL EXCUSE ME I HAVE CLOTHES TO BUY!
